snippet: Kimberly Hill led the United States to its first major women’s volleyball title, scoring 20 points in a 3-1 victory over China in the world championship at Milan.
abstract: Kimberly Hill leads United States to its first major women’s volleyball title, scoring 20 points in 3-1 victory over China in the world championship at Milan.
lead_paragraph: Kimberly Hill led the United States to its first major women’s volleyball title, scoring 20 points in a 3-1 victory over China in the world championship at Milan.

headline.main: U.S. Wins First Major Title in Women’s Volleyball
